{{ content }}

Username is required!
Password is required
Password must be at least 6 characters
Login failed: {{ errorMessage }}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { UserService } from '../_services/user.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-board-user', templateUrl: './board-user.component.html', styleUrls: ['./board-user.component.css'] }) export class BoardUserComponent implements OnInit { content?: string; constructor(private userService: UserService) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.userService.getUserBoard().subscribe({ next: data => { this.content = data; }, error: err => { if (err.error) { try { const res = JSON.parse(err.error); this.content = res.message; } catch { this.content = `Error with status: ${err.status} - ${err.statusText}`; } } else { this.content = `Error with status: ${err.status}`; } } }); } }
